com.snakybo.torch.color

Class Color

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snakybo.torch.color.Color

  • public final class Color
extends java.lang.Object

    A color in the range [0-1]

    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Color32

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Color()
      Create a new color.

      Copy the value of another color.
      Color(float r, float g, float b)
      Create a new color, specifying the red, green and blue component.
      Color(float r, float g, float b, float a)
      Create a new color, specifying the red, green, blue and alpha component.

      • getARGB

        public final int getARGB()
        Returns:
        The ARGB value of the color. Bits 24-31 are alpha, 16-23 are red, 8-15 are green, 0-7 are blue.
